cause.description:
Are you fed up with being called a lunatic because you are not convinced about Global Warming?
Are you sick of having to watch "An Inconvenient Truth," without both sides of the debate being discussed?
Or are you worried about the re-defining of "consensus?"
If any of the above fit you, then this is the group for you.
1. Engineer civilized debate over Global Warming.
2. Inform the uneducated that there are, indeed, two sides to the Global Warming debate.
cause.mission: Engineer civilized debate over the Global Warming controversy.
cause.name: Wait a Minute! What Consensus?
